name: iGBA Black
author: MΛGNETΛR
description: Black version of the default skin.

custom.igba: a[onclick="document.cookie = 'cacheKey=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC;'; location.reload();"], .modal-button {color: #000000!important} .item-link.list-button {color: #000000} .f7-icons, .icon {color: #000000!important} .content-block-inner {background-image: linear-gradient(-225deg, #537895 0%, #09203F 100%)!important;} .label-switch input[type='checkbox']:checked + .checkbox {background-color: #000000!important} i.icon.icon-back {background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmciIHZpZXdCb3g9IjAgMCAxMiAyMCI+PHBhdGggZD0iTTEwLDBsMiwybC04LDhsOCw4bC0yLDJMMCwxMEwxMCwweiIgZmlsbD0iIzAwMCIvPjwvc3ZnPg==')!important} .button-big[style='box-shadow: 0 5px 13px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .1); border:none; background-image: linear-gradient(-225deg, #537895 0%, #09203F 100%); font-weight:bold;'] {background-image: linear-gradient(-225deg, #537895 0%, #09203F 100%)!important;color:white!important}
